impact_weight: The reduction of waste can lead to a decrease in pollution, which in turn can help restore terrestrial ecosystems, reinforcing the achievement of targets related to ecosystem restoration.
Proper management of municipal waste can help reduce pollution and protect biodiversity, creating conditions that further biodiversity conservation targets.
Reducing food waste can lead to more efficient use of resources, enabling the restoration of agricultural ecosystems and promoting sustainable agriculture practices.
The reduction of plastic waste can help protect marine ecosystems, reinforcing the achievement of targets related to marine conservation and restoration.
Promoting circularity and recycling can help reduce waste and pollution, reinforcing the achievement of targets related to ecosystem restoration and conservation.
Improving recycling rates and reducing waste can help protect biodiversity, creating conditions that further biodiversity conservation targets.
Sustainable textile production and recycling can help reduce waste and promote sustainable agriculture practices, enabling the restoration of agricultural ecosystems.

source_subtheme: Circularity/Recycling - Critical Raw Materials - Batteries Recycling
impact_weight: The recycling of critical raw materials, such as those used in batteries, can help reduce the environmental impact of mining and promote ecosystem restoration, reinforcing the achievement of targets related to ecosystem conservation.

Sustainable extraction and import of critical raw materials can help reduce the environmental impact of mining and promote biodiversity conservation, creating conditions that further biodiversity protection targets.

The development and manufacturing of net-zero technologies can help reduce greenhouse gas emissions and promote ecosystem restoration, reinforcing the achievement of targets related to ecosystem conservation and restoration.
